text: Carloman I (ca.750/751 - 771) was a Carolingian Frankish ruler, King of Burgundy and Neustria (768-771). His father was Pepin III. In 768, he inherited the south part of his father's kingdom. He died 3 years later. Category:750s births Category:771 deaths Category:Carolingian dynasty Category:Frankish rulers
title: Carloman I
